alert.note: Alert for Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 02 at 6:40PM MST until December 03 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Very strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft
